subject: Validation Result: Web Browsing Infrastructure Research

evidence.technical_verification: Chrome flags verified against actual startup script, extension issues confirmed through testing
evidence.market_validation: Pricing estimates validated against current Bright Data/Smartproxy rates

findings.notes: Exceptional research quality. All acceptance criteria independently verified. Technical solutions align with industry best practices. Implementation can begin immediately.

content.summary: Research demonstrates excellent technical analysis and actionable implementation planning. Root cause (IP reputation) correctly identified. Hybrid architecture recommendation is technically sound and cost-effective ($25-40/mo). Ready for Aaron's approval and Phase 1 implementation.
next_steps: Aaron approval of architecture and budget
